Package controller

Class MadlibsController

java.lang.Object
controller.MadlibsController
public class MadlibsController
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Saul Weintraub This class is the controller of the Madlibs game. This class contains methods that will be used by the view to execute the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    MadlibsController​(MadlibsModel model)
    This is the constructor for the MadlibsController.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getFilledTemplate()

    This method will return an array that contains the parts of speech that need to fill the template.

    This method will return whether or not the word is the correct part of speech.

  • Constructor Details

    • MadlibsController

      public MadlibsController​(MadlibsModel model)
      This is the constructor for the MadlibsController.
      Parameters:
      model - The model of the game that contains the information needed

  • Method Details

    • isCorrectPartOfSpeech

      public boolean isCorrectPartOfSpeech​(java.lang.String partOfSpeech, java.lang.String word)
      This method will return whether or not the word is the correct part of speech. This method will access the model in order to get the part of speech of the word and will then compare that part of speech with the passed one.
      Parameters:
      partOfSpeech - The part of speech. Must be in the same format as shown in parts_of_speech.txt
      word - The word that is being evaluated for it's parts of speech.
      Returns:
      True if the word is the correct part of speech

    • updateTemplateMapping

      public void updateTemplateMapping​(int index, java.lang.String word)
      This method will update the mapping of the blank spaces in the template that need to be filled. This method will update the templateMap Map located in the MadlibsModel.
      Parameters:
      index - Which blank space the word will fill.
      word - The word that will be filled into the blank space.

    • getNeededTypes

      public java.lang.String[] getNeededTypes()
      This method will return an array that contains the parts of speech that need to fill the template. This method will access the templateMap Map located in the MadlibsModel in order to construct the String array of needed parts of speech.
      Returns:
      A string array containing the parts of speech needed to fill the template in order

    • getFilledTemplate

      public java.lang.String getFilledTemplate()
      This method will replace all the blank spaces in the template with the words chosen by the user. This method will first replace all the parts of speech in the template with three hashtags and will then replace every instance of three hashtags with the words that the user chose to fill the template stored in the templateMap Map located in the MadlibsModel. Then, the method will return the filled template so it can be printed by the view.
      Returns:
      The filled template
